stories.text:
This way you would be able to take someone out to eat who is far away from you.

The restaurant chain could even provide tables where some of the seats are replaced with displays so you can easily see and talk to the people you are eating with.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why not combine Zoom with a restaurant chain to provide remote dining?

stories.text: My NYTimes subscription is ending next month and I am looking for another news subscription I could subscribe to. What news publication is it worthwhile to subscribe to? I’ve read horror stories about dark patterns in cancellation so that should also factor in.
